name: Infinity Realm
description:
Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2
Let there be chaos

You are a wizard Ha... uh maybe not, but you are definitely a wizard stuck in infinity realm,  looking for something, or someone, huh? Hurry!

Game is hard-ish. What's your total deaths and enemies killed counter?
There are 9 levels in total. Two tutorial levels, six main ones and final secret one.

Controls
  • WASD - move
  • LMB - fire
  • SPACE - dash
  • Q - switch between shield and staff (unlocked later) 
  • RMB HOLD (with shield) - catch enemy bullet
Mechanics:
  • Dash to evade damage (cooldown 3.5s)
  • Use shield to block incoming bullets or catch them and send 'em back (can only hold one bullet, after three blocked bullets in short time span, shield will be on cooldown)
Known bugs:
  • When you push box on top of the button and try to step on button yourself by standing as close as possible to box and button, button will detect your step as button up. In order to fix it just step again near the button (with box on top).
